Class Brick

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
      • Brick

  • public class Brick
extends Item
    This class holds all info of a brick: size, position, hits left, and so on.
    Version:
    2013-05-14
    Author:
    Jonathan Olergård, Jack Shabo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Brick()
      Will create a block at default coordinates, and a default amount of hits left.
      Brick(int coordX, int coordY)
      Will create a block at the specified coordinates, and a default amount of hits left.
      Brick(int coordX, int coordY, int hitsLeft)
      Will create a block at the specified coordinates, and a specified amount of hits left.
      Brick(int coordX, int coordY, int sizeX, int sizeY, int hitsLeft)
      Will create a block at the given coordinates, with a given size and number of hits left.

      • Brick

        public Brick()
        Will create a block at default coordinates, and a default amount of hits left.

      • Brick

        public Brick(int coordX,
     int coordY)
        Will create a block at the specified coordinates, and a default amount of hits left.
        Parameters:
        coordX - The block's X coordinate.
        coordY - The block's Y coordinate.

      • Brick

        public Brick(int coordX,
     int coordY,
     int hitsLeft)
        Will create a block at the specified coordinates, and a specified amount of hits left.
        Parameters:
        coordX - The block's X coordinate.
        coordY - The block's Y coordinate.
        hitsLeft - The amount of hits this block can take.

      • Brick

        public Brick(int coordX,
     int coordY,
     int sizeX,
     int sizeY,
     int hitsLeft)
        Will create a block at the given coordinates, with a given size and number of hits left.
        Parameters:
        coordX - The block's X coordinate.
        coordY - The block's Y coordinate.
        sizeX - The block's size in X length.
        sizeY - The block's size in Y length.
        hitsLeft - The amount of hits left until kill.

    • Method Detail

      • getHitsLeft

        public int getHitsLeft()
        Returns:
        The amount of hits left until this brick is destroyed.

      • setHitsLeft

        public void setHitsLeft(int amount)
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount of hits until this brick is destroyed.

      • hit

        public Powerup hit()
        Decreases the amount of hits this block can handle, and has a 10% chance of returning a Powerup. Default method to run when a brick is hit.
        Returns:
        Either a Powerup or null.
